name: antigravity-search
title: Antigravity Search
description: Search and open projects in your code directory with Antigravity IDE
author: roc_sun

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Antigravity Projects
commands.description: Search projects to open with Antigravity IDE

preferences.name: projectsDirectory
preferences.title: Projects Directory
preferences.description: The path to the directory to search for projects

preferences.name: searchDepth
preferences.title: Search Depth
preferences.description: How many levels deep to search for folders (1-5)

preferences.name: agyCommandPath
preferences.title: Antigravity Command Path
preferences.description: Full path to the agy command (leave empty to use default: ~/.antigravity/antigravity/bin/agy)

preferences.name: ignoredFoldersPattern
preferences.title: Ignored Folders Pattern
preferences.description: Regex pattern for folders to ignore during search (leave empty to use default)
